attributes.action: Change the Law and make Cat owners more responsible for their pets.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I know i am not the only one who believes the law should be changed to make cat owners responsible for their animals. 
I am fed up that all year i have cat faeces in my garden and with a young child do not see why i should have to clear up after some elses animal when i chose not to have one. 
Mr Blair, please change this to make the owners change and for the health and safety of Britians children, when toxoplasmosis is such a deadly infection/disease for little one.
